title: I hate myself
body:
Someone asked me to buy things for them and said that he is gonna pay me back.

the day after he did not answer my text and then the other day he blocked me 

anyways I can have my RP back.

replies.body:
It's best to stick within the features and requirements of the [gifting center](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) to help prevent cases like this, and being wary of who you gift.  It's difficult to provide support for transactions or deals made outside of game, and I can't guarantee that we can help with this. 

Reach out to us in a[ player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can take a look into this.  Provide any detail and information about the situation for some context.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
how much rp was it, since project week still hasn't come out I kind of gave up and still have 2900 rp sooo....
